reviewText: I think it is a great guide for bow building, if you can read lips. 3/4 of it the audio is turned down so low you cant hear what he is saying. A real disappointment.
Review the video for only $2.00 on Amazon Instant Video: How To Make A Holmegaard Bow Ain't seen it, but thought this would be helpful. I'd rather lose $2 than $20 if it really is sucky.

Worst how to video ever. I bought this because I figured it would teach me more than YouTube. I was wrong. If only I'd have known it was sooooo easy
1. Cut a limb
2. Carve " oh here let me show you my tools
3. There's no set measurements
And looky here I made a bow
I followed the book's instruction and created a fine working bow. Book will be a part of my library on primitive bow making

I would not recommend this video to anyone who's serious about building a Holemegaard bow. The example given is a poor representation. The tillering sequence leaves much to be desired. Don't waste your money.

The title is about building the HOLMEGAARD bow but a lot of the work is done on a kids english style longbow. VERY little information about the dimensions of the HOLMEGAARD bow.
Very amature production qualities.
Glad I paid the 1.99 to rent and not the 9.99 to purchase.
There is better info out there on building this style of bow.
